abstract.text: Use SwiftUI views that other Apple frameworks provide.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: To access SwiftUI views that another framework defines, import both
SwiftUI and the other framework into the file where you use the view. You
can find the framework to import by looking at the availability information

code: // Center the map on Joshua Tree National Park.

SwiftUI-PageImage-card.png.alt: A black Swift logo on a swirly blue and purple background.

abstract.text: Declare the user interface and behavior for your app on every platform.
